name: fuzzcode
description: Starter kit using NPM based on Foundation

scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run serve
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:watch:css && chokidar 'source/scss/' -c 'npm run build:watch:css'
scripts.watch:js: npm run build:watch:js && chokidar 'source/js/' -c 'npm run build:watch:js'
scripts.build:watch:css: node-sass --source-map-contents --source-map style.min.css.map source/scss/style.scss style.min.css && postcss --config postcss.watch.config.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
